The prevalence rate of blindness in India is 1.4 percent , to bring this prevalence rate to 0.3 percent the National Programme for Control of Blindness was started by the Government of India.	2.3443658219636547

The main reason of blindness is cataract which is about 55 percent of all blindness.	3.155237760252563

Under the Nation Programme for Control of Blindness the blind people specially cataract affected people are being benefited by surgical operation.	2.383906813000131

Special attention is being paid on the quality of the operation of cataract for which all district hospitals , base hospitals are being converted into Microscopic Centres.	2.571666554969802

The program of eye test of the 10 to 14 years old school students is being run as a campaign in the beginning of the educational session to reduce the prevalence rate of blindness and the poor students suffering from vision problem are being distributed glasses free of cost.	2.385032264373843

Active help is being taken from all the governmental , non-governmental , voluntary organizations in the Eye Test Programme.	2.82580728485125

The staffs related to eye department are being trained at different levels by the Government of India to reduce the prevalence rate of blindness.	2.587543916050424

Among the chief reasons of blindness , cataract is 55 percent , vision problems 19 percent , black cataract 4 percent , corneal pathology 7 percent , others 15 percent.	2.452255321368102

Generally pure lens or its capsule becomes dim or milky with which the light can not reach inside the eyes and the patient can see dim or less.	3.159797538524908

After identifying the patient suffering from cataract doctors and eye helpers perform screening in their hospitals.	2.9240986627603798

After that the patient of cataract are operated by eye-surgeon in well maintained hospitals.	3.6153073878467863

Spectacles are tested after 6 weeks.	6.745704255663842

Camping is done through government , non-government and voluntary organizations after comprehensive propagation by District Blindness Control Committees.	2.5509188814364534

The treatment of cataract is possible through surgery only.	5.194967515516867

Complete lens capsule is taken out in the method of Intra Capsular Cataract Extraction , after the operation spectacles are used post-test.	3.3238972349644476

During operation lens is implanted at front of the iris , the frontal part of the eye.	3.903161608751456

In the Extra Capsular Cataract Method , the part of the frontal capsule and the whole of the lens matter is extracted and the posterior part of the capsule is left intact.	2.8767743903455645

Lens is fitted in the capsular bag.	4.959097118377351

In the S.I.C.S.Small Incision Cataract Surgery method , a 6 mm tunnel is formed while the rest of the method follows like that of the ECCE-IOL.	2.420190310615426

In black cataract the eye nerves dilapidates gradually.It happens due to extra water pressure in the eye or because of not enough blood reaching in the eye nerves.	3.4559555563381745

When the extra pressure is more in the eyes.	6.368340052559067

If somebody suffers from black cataract in the family.	4.844618672906307

In most of the patients the part of the water channel from the eyes are open yet for some reasons the water gets lessened.	3.6170098121164385

Seeing rainbow like colorful ovals in light.	4.39125392684672

Reproduction rate has always been low in Uttarakhand in comparison with the original state Uttar Pradesh.	3.31699325982112

Raw birth rate of this state in the period of 1951-1956 was 48 which decreased to become 35 in the period of 1976-1981 and during the years of 1994-2001 this rate lowered more and stayed at 26 only.	2.386708363745934

Among the districts this rate is the least in Paudi while the most in Haridwar.	3.1391288854892045

Gross reproduction rate the number of infants given birth by a woman in her life time which was estimated to be more than 5 for the period of 1971-76 , has been continuously decreasing and in the year of 2001 this number was 3.3.	2.8924484959009304

Inter district differences has also occurred less during this period.	3.3375849165865112

Raw birth rate and gross reproduction rate has been different in urban and rural areas.	2.8370038320515163

It is the desire of son that will affect the future reproductive level of the state.	3.197394904308356

Generally , birth rate is lower the hilly areas than in the plain areas.	3.2011097217664224

About one fourth of the women give birth to the next child within 24 months.	4.23387608112585

Leprosy is a bacteria born contagious disease.	4.778622505866146

The name of this bacteria is microbacterium leprae.	4.59326524240804

Leprosy can affect persons of any age and sex equally.	4.116304747031646

The M.D.T.medicine cures the patient completely by eradicating the leprosy bacteria and prevents the disease from spreading in the society.	2.5322804054052828

All the leprosy patients are not contagious.	5.710632042139151

Most of the patients are non-contagious who can not spread the disease , only 15 to 20 percent patients are contagious.	3.4867916866344117

Leprosy is comparatively much less contagious than other diseases such as measles , T.B.etc.	2.779099175076336

About 95 percent of the people have the resistance capability to fight leprosy thereby this disease can not happen to them.	3.5629387235868126

The main symptoms and identification of leprosy are as follows.	3.222683174977994

A light yellow or discolored reddish spot or stain on skin of the body that has numbness , i.e.the spot has no feeling of pain , inflammation , itching or piercing or cold and hot.	2.697150529665202

Oily shine on the skin.	8.116803682657661

Thickness of cyst on skin , eyebrows , chin , ears.	4.145563546190505

Do not do any hard work for three months after the operation of hernia.	4.461446426125449

Thrilling sensation , numbness or dryness in hands or feet.	3.9157559657013006

Occurrence of deformation in the fingers of hands or feet.	4.156993936443347

Initiation and spread of leprosy.	8.548991250596302

Leprosy often starts with a spot or freckle on the body that is numb.	3.960655708556784

If this gets treated in the initial stage then the disease is cured completely and the disability does not get aroused in it that is the main reason of social excommunication.	3.7387493397043183

If the treatment is not done due to careless or lack of right information about leprosy then the disease keeps on growing.	2.798994072745795

Fingers start becoming malformed , wounds erupt in hands and feet and the face starts looking ugly.	3.3662231850240603

Most of the people reach the doctor for advice in this stage.	3.793702692289722

Wounds and ulcer form because of no care for the numb and insensitive parts of the leprosy patients.	3.0412348851590503

Complete treatment is possible even in the stage of wound and ulcer but the disability and deformity that occurred due to lateness in treatment can not be brought back to the previous state through medicines.	2.7782070528809086

Yes , the hands and feet of the disabled person can be formed in such a way through simple operations so that the patient can work again and run his livelihood.	3.4380413244906403

Malaria spreads through the bite of female anopheles mosquito.	4.809072235093002

Female anopheles mosquitoes get born in clean water and bites at night.	3.179161332968831

Fever along with shivering and cold comes often the third day.	3.349818711397608

You must change water collected in pots at home once a week.	2.9280999166767607

Use mosquito nets while sleeping or apply mustard oil on open parts of the body.	3.067631271782931

Install fine nets on windows of house.	4.992548652088679

Do not let water collect near yourself.	4.341449644285614

If this is not possible then pour some petro-lubricants oil on the collected water.	4.0302925706842325

The disease of measles can take a very serious form in developing countries because the death rate due to this is more than 10 percent.	3.782177573532935

Mumps or contagious perotitis is a kind of serious contagious disease in which a swelling emerges in one or both of saliva glands near the jaws and starts paining.	2.8070135364273017

Saliva glands are present inside the cheeks in front of the ears and respectively on the lower surface of the mouth.	3.968793010805125

Besides this , mouth also starts drying up due to mumps.	4.197919385523216

Rubella occurring immediately after birth is generally nominal and stays only for a while.	3.5435627818862034

The use of MMR vaccines has been extremely effective.	3.668119180367816

Tuberculosis is a contagious disease.	8.019434200546916

Tuberculosis occurs due to contraction of microbacterium tuberculosis.	6.677684406803845

The tuberculosis disease spreads through air from a tuberculosis patient to a healthy person and can happen to people of any age or sex.	3.4491860905514335

A tuberculosis patient can infect 10-15 persons in a year.	4.068166514445732

About 1000 adults die everyday of tuberculosis in India which is much higher than the total number of deaths occurring due to all other diseases.	2.9349673295541154

Tuberculosis can occur in any part of the body such as lungs , bones , joints or the sides of lymph nodes.	4.3752775658417145

This disease is found commonly in the lungs.	5.0118499666512335

In comparison to any other infected patients the youths die the most of the disease.	3.6116188057851852

Because it is the youths who die the most of it therefore social and economic loss is much.	3.132794506083529

The quantity of tuberculosis in the society is too much.People are afraid to say about this and proper tests could not be get done.	2.8290624421383512

In comparison to any other disease there are more orphans due to tuberculosis.	3.555605622688197

According to fresh research 3 lac children in India drop out of school due to this disease every year.	3.1601538902549997

The maximum number of tuberculosis patients in the world are found in India.	5.3229650485231135

Although the incidence of privilege rate is not available but studies state that the incidence rate is about 256 per lac.	2.583287849745397

The number of women dying of tuberculosis is more than the deaths caused by all other reasons combined.	3.2454156505980873

This has been found in fresh studies that one lac women are thrown away from homes because of tuberculosis.	2.8410722422084143

In comparison with healthy humans the danger of tuberculosis in HIV positive humans increases 5 times.	3.512463681575757

Tuberculosis infected patients should be treated with the DOTS strategy.	4.880069640786509

Coughs of 3 weeks or more is the chief symptom of tuberculosis of the lungs.	3.8682670925805684

The easy way of diagnosis of tuberculosis of the lungs is three times test of the phlegm.	3.599134209498903

The bacteria of the tuberculosis comes out of the patient in the form of droplets on coughing or sneezing.	5.010236379706793

The bacteria out in the air enters into healthy humans through breath and infects the healthy person with tuberculosis.	3.3264460238550524

Diagnosis is done by testing the bacteria of tuberculosis in the phlegm , X-ray is also used if necessary.	3.6307425722298143

List of training test centres where cancer can be tested.	3.1717501460779554

Tuberculosis can be completely cured.	8.305119824952595

If the patient does the treatment regularly.	6.7386277926973595

There is treatment for tuberculosis but on recovering a little the patient quits treatment.	2.7697942426002813

Treatment in tuberculosis is now done through the DOTS strategy.	3.9004442350472686

In DOTS strategy patient is administered medicines under the direct care of the health workers.	3.6042215249934118

Which is called DOTS Directly Observed Treatment with Short course chemotherapy.	2.9166175856252834

As is revealed from the name - Directly Observed Treatment with Short course chemotherapy means that patient takes short courses of anti-tuberculosis drugs in presence of health worker.	2.1877449253383907

There are two stages in the treatment of tuberculosis.	5.780637965858733

Intensive phase which goes on for 2-3 months.	6.682299239776108

Continuation phase is of 4-5 months which depends on the category of the treatment patient is taking.	4.25674653599246

Under this program these medicines are taken thrice a week on alternate days for 2-3 months intensive phase.	3.084652061048546

After this phlegm is tested which if found negative , the patient is issued anti-tuberculosis drugs once in a week in the calendared multi-blistered combo pack.	2.5543014155324255

Remember , the first dose of the weekly pack has to be taken before the health worker.	3.98199380189587

During the continuation phase after two months phlegm should be tested and also after the treatment is complete.	3.316809416209465

You will watch the patient during the period of continuation phase.	3.894870420331058

The best way to check the disease is that if all the phlegm patients are made negative then the patient can not infect and whoever human is having coughs of more than three weeks then he should be encouraged to take DOTS after the three phlegm test.	2.8352900548462925

Every nerve cell has a long tail.	5.008603127815415

This tail is as small as 1 mm in some , then in others it is as long as thousand mm or one metre.	2.356715410066155

The brain is an infinite maze of several thousand crores of cells and the mutual network between them.	2.7248145298307

On the whole either the pregnancy does not stay in women suffering from tumor or even if it stays then many more complications occur during pregnancy.	2.593508582573724

The following tests are important for fibroid.	5.684232898355923

Sonography through abdomen or vagina transabdominal and transvaginal.	3.6437483922933565

Laparoscopy , hysteroscopy , M.R.I.if needed.	4.82187997655039

H.S.G.if the doctor thinks essential.	4.313857636689953

After finding out the condition of fibroid in the uterus with these tests , it can be ascertained by which method it can be removed.	4.097475225346116

Mere presence of the glandular swelling is not a prerequisite for its removal.	3.6902545605895645

If the symptoms are not appearing then the woman can be counselled and can be asked to come for check up after some time , this treatment in itself is satisfactory.	2.9020858307009774

There is a knot , and therefore it has to be removed , it is not necessary.	4.223918959157625

If the knot is very big and is getting bigger continuously , if the woman is panicking , the symptoms increase , the symptoms of bleeding , pain and pressure appear , then only it should be removed.	2.901927299263273

If the sub mucous fibroid is small then it can be removed with the help of uterine hysteroscopic endoscopy.	3.498239879740255

The fibroid can also be removed with the help of lasers.	5.437753698415448

There are two types of operations for fibroid.	4.67940517514241

Myomactomy removal of knot only , this operation is done with hysteroscopy or laparoscopy by doing laparotomy opening stomach.	2.801267044368267

Just the tumor is removed in case of young aged females who do not want more children.	4.369058510018067

Hysterectomy : If the age is not less , the tumor is very big and there is no need of having more children then the entire uterus is removed together with the tumor.	3.3537689382369424

Medication is provided to decrease bleeding and for pain relief and iron is given for treating anemia.	3.2671101224043797

Some special injection and medicine can be given to reduce the size of the fibroid.	4.836245181606782

But due to these medicines the symptoms of bone weakness and menopause are produced.	4.310360389696577

The condition becomes as before on stopping the medicine.	4.584290706171881

The modern treatment laparoscopic myolysis through laser Nd-YYAG.	3.533296082616968

The blocking of uterine artery ambolization.	5.847150381429301

In modern treatment the uterine artery is blocked by putting poly vinyl particles or gel foam powder through a pipe entered through the thigh artery after anaesthesising it.	2.0259742131104037

By blocking the uterine artery the blood supply available to the tumor gets obstructed and the tumor reduces up to 60 %.	2.690488567790916

A skilful gynaecologist is capable of doing proper treatment after considering everything.	3.65499172411018

Therefore , it is unnecessary to be scared of leiomyoma disease.	3.3249804182077325

The investigation of the secrets of brain -.	5.364310249302517

If we gradually cut open with a saw and separate the upper part of the skull of a man after making him unconscious on an operation table then by peering inside we can ourselves see the live brain with our own eyes.	2.1649820268462343

Similarly , neuro-surgeons operate the brain by cutting the skull bones with saw and drill.	2.8768515097430325

Bacterial dysentery occurs from a special type of bacteria bacilli.	5.2875413206083

Many things are of just the sort as the inner kernel of the walnut seen after cracking it.	2.544072296514016

By look so simple but how wonderful is the brain in work capacity.	3.175708832043012

On investigating any part of brain with microscope we will see that it is mainly made of just one type of cell , neuron or nerve cell.	3.09607926236039

In bacterial dysentery there is repeated discharge of fecus consisting of blood and phlegm.	3.414707528092476

Disease of bacterial dysentery is more rampant in places of temperate environment.	3.501528046241081

The disease of bacterial dysentery occurs more in monsoon season in India.	4.581187843028348

In the main part of the brain all the life processes keep taking place and a very small center or nucleus controls all of them in the same way as in any other normal cell.	3.1780858221237587

In women , men and all the aged people the disease of bacterial dysentery occurs in similar manner.	3.898831229524372

By disrupting the phlegmatic action of the large intestine and the phlegmatic action of the end part of the small intestine the bacteria of the disease of bacterial dysentery produce solvency in them.	3.1411126263676756

The matter which fascinated Kahal the most , that was the mutual network process of the nerve cells.	2.856823464016024

In this immense crowd of cells one cell actually does not touch any other cell.	2.6113359393129274

The axon of one appears to be going very near to the other cell but there always remains a certain distance between the two.	3.0977468081132566

Kahal studied these network places with great minuteness , which later on were given the name of synapse by Sir Charles Sherrington.	2.7405638270013104

How does the information or signal reach from one cell to the other cell ?.	3.4557787940587716

There are special chemicals or neurotransmitters which do the work of messenger in this synapse.Henry Dale and Otto Loewi made an important discovery by finding acetylcholine.	2.1537027135095475

Consciously a valley has been left between every two nerve cell so that the electric impulse can not cross by jumping over , it has to take the help of a chemical messenger and then alone the signal can get forwarded.	2.704143563718444

After all why the interference of these chemical substances in the electrical communication system ?.	3.0508791493673892

If we think deeply then this one fact comes up that in this system the information travels in one direction only , not haphazard.	2.578225881877684

Every synapse gives unidirectional instruction , because the chemical substance can be secreted from the end of the axon only.	3.161779236582172

In fact in axon the electricity can be conducted equally from both the directions just like wire.	2.8020880650069673

But the direction gets decided at every synapse , because the chemical messenger which can cross the valley is present at the end of axon and not in the body of the next cell.	2.7024537152045123

Thus the signals can never cross the synaptic valley in the opposite direction.	3.0577716415975846

Without this directional instruction the signals running between the millions of cells from both the directions then will create ultimate chaos.	2.4071064338610975

The second benefit is that because of this chemical process there is a delay of approximately the thousandth part of a second or 1.0 milli second.	3.266787175599167

This way the signals can be sequenced with respect to time.	3.772157806315822

The more the synapses in a neuronal circuit , the slower would be the communication in them.	2.7567375532242386

Synapse has one more use as well.	4.841346074054284

Because of one chemical substance coming medially we can easily interfere in the communication system of brain.	2.9001204102574025

These chemical substances are called medicines.	6.042123106075869

Many medicines given by the doctors today - like anaesthesia to make unconscious , tranquilizers for inducing sleep and peace , and many intoxicating substances affect these synapses only.	2.400449707419472

Why the action site of these medicines are synapse and not the nerve cell itself , to understand it will not be now difficult.	2.9554406244172453

Therefore the effect of these medicines are more in those regions only where there is dense net of synapses.	3.7036210831385468

The person afflicted with the disease of bacterial diarrhoea suddenly becomes victim of intense stomach pain and dysentery.	4.200074368633717

Every cell in itself appears to be very simple as a unit , but the complex mass of thousands of crores of cells give birth to unlimited possibilities by connecting mutually.	2.697615701933039

Perhaps this only is the physical basis of our intelligence , consciousness and memory.	3.1849581049728437

From the point of view of creation we can divide the brain into many parts.	2.7860714162925904

Because of being enclosed in a box of bones at one end of the body it is not easy for the brain to keep a direct contact with all the distant parts of the body.	3.3281125614236085

Therefore the role of our spinal cord connected with brain in the form of an extension branch is very important.	3.43409372600152

Like a thick white rope from the neck to the lower part of the back , spinal cord is safe in the spinal bones.	3.4165650682029582

At regular interval , through the medium of 31 spinal nerves from both its sides spinal cord has contact with the entire body.	3.0488993486494116

Each moment our spinal cord keeps receiving information from skin and other organs , and each moment that keeps sending proper instruction to our muscles.	2.345099086698909

The spinal cord finishes many normal work on its own on this basis , it does not disturb the brain for everything.	3.016619913456801

For example , it maintains a proper tension in our muscles so that we can keep standing erect.	2.9648990520277216

We withdraw hand when all of a sudden a pin pierces finger.	3.333351449598385

This reflex action occurs at the level of spinal cord.	4.914102080155109

The simplest and basic example of the work method of nervous system is this reflex action only.	3.030386958574021

Apart from this the main use of spinal cord is like a highway alone.	3.772417478720606

Thus the consequence of minor injury on spinal cord can be serious.	3.109229836079652

But now let us reach to the brain moving above the spinal cord.	3.8216845169860387

The brain starts just as we enter the head.	3.9914610798022516

Or let us say that the spinal cord gets converted into brain.	4.5249843874454445

On seeing it appears as if the brain is like a very big walnut resting on a strong stem or branch.	3.3969052095970866

Therefore we can divide the brain into 2 parts.	4.111166996336879

One is this straight stem or brain stem and the second is the main part or cerebrum resting on it.	3.019708743667599

In fact brain stem seems to be similar to the spinal cord , and it is also situated in its straight line , but it is divided into three parts if we see attentively.	3.3236121386322393

The various centres which control our internal life processes are present in this alone.	3.1385869693297255

Like , breathing , beating of heart , controlling of blood pressure , digestion of food etc..	3.9834703119771255

A sudden jerk or injury on the medulla can therefore lead to death in a moment.	2.8827301490846824

But there is nothing to get scared in this.	4.741550222406888

Nature has placed this very important control-room in a very safe place at the center of the head.	3.3886230496406653

At times in scooter or road accident the neck gets jerked very severely , and medulla stops doing its work on getting damaged.	2.1278958225147058

The ordinary looking injury becomes the reason of immediate death.	5.043225004291729

The same happens when the criminals are hanged.	3.982934398064394

Medulla alone is the originating place of 7 out of 12 cranial nerves as well.	3.0825579049106206

The cranial nerves control the muscles of face , tongue , shoulders etc., bring auditory signals from the ears and controls many other internal organs.	2.808752804876191

If we cross the medulla oblongata from top then pons and mid-brain come.	2.5836851489201758

Mid-brain and pons mainly work as junction.	4.110058761879725

In a way here many small branches emanate from the main stream of nerves or highway.	2.6912117018641792

Like a skilful computer cerebellum does two very important jobs.	3.307614818104183

First , because of its support only we are able to maintain our balance by standing on just two lags.	3.2029373378165147

We do not fall even when fleeing , running , doing acrobats , bending forward - backward.	3.1244151172795114

Second , this cerebellum only adjusts all our voluntary actions very minutely.	2.9702938748314827

Cerebellum does their fine adjustment with the voluntary actions.	3.624235338819778

Earlier we mentioned 12 cranial nerves out of which 7 had their origin from medulla.	3.3318402842032375

Similarly 4 more emanate from pons mid-brain.	4.376937183723595

Their work is to control the muscles responsible for rotating the eyes and to carry sensation from the face.	3.5270188847866173

Now after crossing the brain stem we reach the most huge and main part of the brain - cerebrum or fore-brain.	3.086503792677896

From the unconscious state we have come to the conscious state.	3.982808733833561

There is one such speciality in cerebrum which has been a riddle for us even now.	3.6463280294598013

This is divided into two parts , which we call the right and the left cerebral hemispheres.	3.609711930949147

Strange thing is this , that the right hemisphere is connected to the left half of the body and controls that alone while the left hemisphere is connected to the right half of the body.	3.5001074810554043

All the nerves traveling to and fro have to cross the middle line to go to the other side.	2.9942275740588453

This very system is found in all the organisms.	8.041157447229864

The effect of an injury in the right half of the head is seen in the left half of the body.	5.15783104448955

Similarly , on pricking a needle in the left hand its pain can be felt by the right cerebral hemisphere.	3.5600986651608233

Like a modern office in the cerebrum also the division of labor has been done in a very good manner.	3.3326820840761893

The upper thick surface of 3 mm is called cortex and the maximum nerve cells accumulate in this only.	2.661582048411363

In the rest inner part the net of wire like nerves are spread.	2.865867696465107

The small masses of some cells only may be seen somewhere in middle.	2.949750486491785

The most posterior part of this cortex does the work of vision , while a very small part at the center does hearing.	3.2034085793959384

The system of olfaction is at the lower surface.	5.081636296247791

But we should not forget that neither light nor sound or smell can reach in the brain.	2.779513546964572

Only the electric impulses are reaching there through the nerves.	3.5750094279776654

So who is seeing , hearing everything while sitting in our cerebrum ?.	3.8417515733135836

Is one more small man is sitting inside the human brain ?.	3.4938111771963385

This is a complex riddle by which since time immemorial both scientists and philosophers are being perplexed.	2.43563270225629

Approximately 1 cm wide and 6 cm long strip on the surface of the central part of the cerebrum is called ` motor cortex ' and all the muscles of the other half of the body is being controlled from here alone.	3.249325122800544

The representation of body here also is inverted only : head down and legs up.	2.8013730568948985

What is the secret behind this chaotic system , even no one knows this nicely.	2.8743669988627087

Then only we realize pain.	6.781172898562364

The pain is in finger , this is only a natural illusion so that we immediately protect our own finger.	2.9550753059329016

We can not move our hands and feet even if we feel like.	3.901443574331166

This is called paralysis.	9.161466612773053

The daring with which this operation was done much more surprising than that were the results.	2.641681904240114

In maximum people the straight or right hand is much stronger and dexterous.	2.9578374778641585

Right hemisphere - geometry , painting , instrumental music , organization of facts , estimation of space.	2.828529342349755

Whatever we study in class generally gets accumulated in the right or left hemisphere according to this area division.	3.5085716102034397

Female anopheles mosquito lays its eggs in stagnant water like ponds , lakes , wells , rivers , drains etc..	2.4858110234421087

These eggs are very small and they keep floating on the surface of the water.	3.6917992856561175

Generally , the eggs and the larva which come out of the eggs thereafter get a place to hide behind the grass or the plants by the side of water.	2.597987512836064

Larva comes out of the egg in 24-28 hours of the laying of eggs.	4.569173870440537

Larva gets converted to pupa in 5-6 days , which start taking dips in water.	3.0121167764980266

In 2 or 3 days it flies away becoming an adult mosquito from pupa.	2.9441706229514812

Adult mosquito rests at 45 degree angle from the surface.	4.0074589787074455

This way while becoming mosquitoes from egg their enemy is gambusia fish which eats their eggs in the state of larva , pupa.	2.345585396386757

High blood pressure is dangerous for health -.	7.217089089795374

Blood pressure is not such an illness that can not be controlled.	4.601301336205696

By adopting a course of abstinence and medicines it is possible to prevent the serious consequences of blood pressure.	3.174137826047463

Blood pumped from left chamber of the heart circulates in the arteries spread throughout the body and it is the very pressure exerted on the walls of the arteries by blood circulation which is called blood pressure.	3.89219194302514

The pressure generating in the systolic shrinking stage of heart is called systolic blood pressure and the pressure generating in the diastolic expanding stage of the heart , diastolic blood pressure.	2.9842600711157377

The systolic blood pressure in a normal person is less than 140 m.m.and the diastolic blood pressure is less than 90 m.m.of mercury.	3.6879689725852853

Blood pressure of a normal man should be less than 140  90.	5.26928883332974

We call it increasing situation of systolic blood pressure on systolic blood pressure going above 140 m.m.mercury and increasing situation of diastolic blood pressure on it going above 90 m.m.mercury.	2.534732635099393

In any person either of the two blood pressures the systolic or diastolic can mount up or both the blood pressures can increase together.	2.362668804086118

These are all named high blood pressure.	5.09054760215412

For the health of a person it is necessary for his blood pressure to be normal.	5.021287044917783

There is pressure on heart as blood pressure mounts up and also there is adverse effect of it on the different parts of body.	3.3735324990052136

Whenever there is decrease or increase in the pumping capacity of heart , there is a defect in valve of the heart , blockage in the main arteries emerging from the heart or vessels have contracted in the whole artery system and blood circulation is abnormal , then blood pressure starts mounting up.	3.147121335788715

Hormones oozing from some special endocrinal glands in the body also play an important role in the blood pressure increase.	4.751135380556213

Blood pressure also increases in case of disease in kidneys or their veins.	4.986504702194592

Such blood pressures are called renal blood pressure.	4.257210229515611

Though blood pressure can occur to anyone in any stage - children , youth , middle aged or aged , but generally disease of high blood pressure occurs more in individuals above 40 years of age.	2.6993786723720827

Hepatitis - B can be more dangerous than AIDS.	5.552586396369079

Hepatitis-B is a common disease happening worldwide whose virus infects the liver in a serious manner.	3.50501743245439

Virus of Hepatitis-B produce swelling in the liver because of which it can not function properly.	5.513646019028788

This disease is even more infectious than AIDS because it goes very easily into body of another person via blood.	2.573409909424371

Just one virus of Hepatitis B is enough to spread this disease.	4.467379937241397

Other than blood it also spreads by other fluids and liquid substances coming out of body.	3.202498785945401

Like defecation , mother 's milk , tears , drool and open wounds.	4.233285999002986

By eating medicine on time and by following the advice of doctor 95 % people get better in 6 months.	3.8221558200676125

The causes behind spreading of Hepatitis-B are the following :.	4.610905117784604

If blood of infected person is transfused in the body of a healthy person or the shot which was given to an infected person is given to a normal person then this virus goes from the infected person to the healthy person.	3.4291053482569644

The most important causes of Hepatitis B happen to be at the time of child birth from the womb of infected mothers.	3.8249218268955527

During this , the blood which touches the body of the child , the virus situated in that infected blood goes inside the child as soon as coming in contact with the blood of the child.	3.4694064977408

Along with India in all the countries of Asia this type of infection spreads a lot and new born baby gets infected from infancy itself.	3.181805671510122

In the field of athletics when an infected individual gets wounded and if his blood somehow comes in contact with the blood of a healthy person then it spreads very easily.	2.923090299806539

It also spreads exceedingly among those who consume drugs via needle.	3.2461476584021267

If an applied syringe taken from an infected person is used by another person then virus goes in the healthy person.	2.7922870087029046

When someone in man and woman is infected with Hepatitis B and they have unprotected sexual intercourse then by this also the virus goes in the healthy person.	2.9627754907440784

Even 1 part of blood of a person infected with Hepatitis B is capable of spreading Hepatitis B.	4.511407016253796

Hepatitis B is more dangerous than AIDS can be reckoned by this fact that the number of people that die because of Hepatitis B in 1 day is same as the number of people that die with the infection of AIDS in a year.	2.8886408304264686

In India healthy person is also infected with Hepatitis B.	4.419017519781425

In many individuals despite being Hepatitis B positive they do not have the knowledge that they have Hepatitis B because this virus is unable to affect that individual too much.	3.0836323792529114

If Hepatitis B infects young people then 95 % get free of the disease in 6 months only.Only the remaining 5 % stay infected with the disease.	3.230994101366639

Protection of heart -.	15.869473175351844

Heart of human is of four chambers meaning ` left-right auricles ' and ` left-right ventricles '.	2.896428394786827

Between auricles and ventricles special ` valves ' have been made which in reality do the work of gatekeeper.	3.058024461850769

The valve of the left side is called ` mitral ' and valve of right side is called ` tricuspid '.	3.76567110128771

From these blood can go from auricle to ventricle only and can not come back up because by then they are closed.	2.823451929642689

This way at the meeting point of ventricles and main blood-carriers also these valves of the shape of half moon give permission to blood to circulate in the whole body through the medium of the main blood-carriers.	2.8289313145413235

Blood is not able to return back into the heart because by that time these valves shut.	3.4562498457701225

After all what is the necessity of blood circulation every moment ? 	5.178348389220774

Medical literature says that by complete blood circulation 1200 cc Oxygen is received by every cell that is successful in giving only 5 minutes of life to them , hence it is necessary for blood circulation to get activated again.	2.67748620512652

Veins ' is name of those blood-carriers that collect blood from all over the body and do the job of returning it back to the heart.	3.1401496240285507

Hence there is no exaggeration of this condition that our heart is greater and more efficient than any human made instrument.	3.0329022150448273

What is stress urinary incontinence ? 	6.15926181360039

With increasing age the problem of urine coming out unknowingly can not be overlooked just like that.	3.845395340987533

While finishing daily chores of life , while coughing or sneezing , laughing , while picking up stuff by bending sudden leakage of urine is called S.U.I., that is , stress urinary incontinence.	2.308929019803366

The specialists of International Urology Association have to say that an individual 's muscles and connective tissue which are a support of Urethra , do not remain so capable to be able to support the Urethra.	2.49766038408966

Other than this when sphincter , that works like a valve , during pressure is not able to stay shut then also urine leaks out in some amount.	2.572234644411746

By International Urology Association such an estimation has been made that 1 out of 3 women at some point in their life has to face S.U.I.	2.889522466570777

However this disease has been seen most in women of 35 to 60 years of age.	4.7663807778502845

Main symptoms of jaundice -.	10.960539621233444

In jaundice substance named bilirubin becomes more than normal.	4.691820456541414

As a consequence of which in the gaps of skin , nails , urine and mouth yellowness is seen.	2.5453433102137004

Bilirubin named colored substance is made in our body absolutely everyday.	5.123240603120571

The root source of generation of bilirubin are red molecules of blood.	3.049829953029114

The life of red molecules of blood has been considered as about 120 days.	3.8240689465501307

They get destroyed after 120 days.	7.194545175069532

On getting destroyed substance named bilirubin is born out of them.	3.9800833390764305

Bilirubin keeps going round in our body through the course of blood.	4.846450720529527

Through the course of blood bilirubin reaches our liver.	4.027677180338584

In the liver a bit of bilirubin gets destroyed and some part through the bile juice after reaching small intestine gets mixed with faeces and gives faeces its own color.	2.4109197144921253

This is the very reason that the colors of faeces are various.	3.13428277315963

If there comes an obstruction in the bile duct that makes bilirubin reach the intestine from the liver then this substance does not reach the intestine.	2.705752518578448

As a result color of faeces becomes white.	4.0749135422475105

Faeces becoming white is considered the main symptom of jaundice.	5.347782367406604

In this way some amount of bilirubin while coming out through urine makes urine like itself.	2.935441696854241

As a result of defect in liver the cycle of bilirubin gets disturbed.	3.540287491783883

The time of the inoculation of measles is a good time to give the dose of Vitamin A.	4.190042007709389

The treatment of children affected with the deficiency of Vitamin A.	4.768328880006275

One to four weeks after this second dose of 2,00,000 I.U.of Vitamin A should be given.	3.9452283148347016

The quantity of Vitamin A in syrup is 1,00,000 I.U.per millilitre.	3.6811073918776693

What is conception ? 	13.805161766422895

When the sperms of man meet with the ovum of woman then conception takes place.	2.951173662503532

But before this conception many situations are formed.	4.4222051204937545

Firstly the sperms reach the uterus by going through the vaginal canal and enter the fallopian tube.	2.842594749830148

Here in the broad portion of the tube there is mating with the developed eggs which comes out of the ovary.	3.5229708348795525

On entering the eggs sperms mix their chromosomes with the egg.	3.2343735677858736

The egg gets fertilized and after developing gets converted into a multicelled ball which is called blastocyst.	3.048035228286711

This gets attached to the surface of the uterus.	5.686165746588571

The contact with the muscles of the tube and the cilia lining as thin as hair advance the egg towards uterus.	3.0477984656001493

The egg does not advance on its own.	4.231860484492567

Every month many eggs are developed but in hair follicle only one egg is able to develop.	3.015810145923616

The other eggs get squeezed on their own.	4.254358808964053

Lakhs of sperms enter the uterus but maximum get destroyed due to the reason of the acidic substances inside.	3.2176751002120554

One or two out of whatever sperms escape get attached to the outer layer of the egg and the moment conception takes place , it puts a ban on the entry of other sperms.	2.651298307165646

Following situations come in conception.	6.978120381337144

Sperms passes through the uterus and goes to the fallopian tube.	5.080827347202502

The egg enters the tube.	7.126630823739088

The sperm makes the egg conceive.	5.623246152368099

The zygote gets divided into two.	5.864412255489647

64 cells of zygote enter inside the uterus.	5.013021006645767

This gets converted into a seed.	6.292917468437807

On reaching its destination the seed gets connected with the surface of the uterus.	3.5983104818517395

Here it gets nutritive substances from the blood cells of the mother.	4.446025380345553

The family planning program was started in the country from 1951.	5.611097288191614

Its aim was only to plan the population.	4.4936132654532965

Afterwards for the attainment of the missions of the program it started being used for mass education and propaganda.	2.9466412310916144

In the decade of seventies by stressing on vasectomy extreme strictness was done in the achievement of goals.	2.647632982538085

As a result opposition was produced among masses towards family planning program.	2.876686486159006

During the seventh plan year 1985 - 90 in place of the family planning program the program was given the identity of family welfare.	3.5473890249574174

In this special emphasis was given on the health related needs of women of reproductive age and children of less than five years.	3.2227693502892176

In 1985 - 86 pervasive vaccination was started.	6.6144316659433775

In pervasive vaccination the aim was fixed to bring down the death rate and sickness of young children from such diseases whose prevention is possible through vaccines.	2.5526537488809797

Thereafter by looking at the benefits of this program in the decade of nineties child safety and safe motherhood C.S.S.M.was prepared and implemented from 1992 - 93.	2.492742081798452

In the present times all the family welfare services continuing from before were kept implemented.	2.733426174017408

In it reproductive health , youth health , sex generated disease , infection of reproductive system and AIDS were included.	2.705793964977796

It was given the name of reproduction and child health.	5.454825479176426

Reproduction and child health program was implemented in the region.	4.940123631364976

In the place of goal oriented method from the year 1997 community needs are ascertained on the basis of assessment policy.	2.8598467354488806

The work plan of health workers only would be the base of all the plans.	4.392234084929161

The district work plans together would take the form of state work plan.	3.729161313925435

The partner plan is the form of proposal.	6.844599022188854

It is written in it that the government investment during the eighth plan for family welfare is reducing.	2.883230226832347

This situation looks even more unsatisfactory.	5.310403632030877

How to identify fast breathing rate ? 	5.794281434200841

In child of less than two months of age the rate of breathing being 60 per minute or more.	3.9157237683789625

In the age of 1 to 5 years of age in the condition of pneumonia 40 per minute or more.	4.155199351436573

The meaning of the movement of ribs is that the movement of the lower part of the chest certainly towards inside with breathing.	4.017580291967162

Only the soft tissue between the ribs or the upper part of the collar bone goes inside with the breathing of the child.	2.9876894188883325

This will not be called the movement of the ribs.	6.765744759562157

The movement of the ribs have been defined in the form of sub costal suction or pull.	3.549477557623879

The movement of ribs in small children is normal thing.	4.0336827800715245

The sight if ribs very clearly very deep and easy to see may be the sign of pneumonia.	3.1875325217702764

If you are doubtful about the ribs of the child then change the position of the child and check again.	4.015173663616038

If the body of the child is bent from waist then the decision of the speed of the lower part of the chest is doubtful.	4.070844874782426

Change the position of the child in such manner that he keeps lying straight in the lap of the mother.	3.4649787001291683

Despite this if the movement of the ribs is not seen clearly then it should be believed that the ribs are not moving.	3.3611963281106263

the movement of the ribs is important only when it moves continuously and is seen clearly.	3.715558672644613

If this is seen only in the unhappy state of the child or while it is taking nutrition and not in the state of rest then believe that there is no rib movement.	3.6963306728543754

Because of deficiency of dopamine activity of another chemical called acetylcholine increases.	3.430258820378442

This problem that has come into concordance with dopamine and acetylcholine produces abnormal shivering and stiffness in body.	2.916669361718223
